snippet.title: Inspiring: One Million LinkedIn Members Want To Volunteer Their Skills to Make A Positive Impact On The World
snippet.description:
* Inspiring: One Million LinkedIn Members Want To Volunteer Their Skills to Make A Positive Impact On The World Dean Thompson April 7, 2014
Many professionals today, especially millennials, are looking to make social impact a part of their daily lives by seeking opportunities to donate their time and talents to support causes they’re passionate about. That’s why, in September 2013, LinkedIn announced the ability for members to signal their interest in volunteering or serving on a nonprofit board on their LinkedIn Profiles. Since then, more than 1 million members have indicated their interest. In addition to these…
